bio:
Dee Nickerson is a rural artist whose very personal style and broad appeal has won her many admirers and collectors. She exhibits her original work at a small selection of galleries in Suffolk, Norfolk, Somerset and London. Dee Nickerson's exhibitions of original paintings sell out in a matter of hours by collectors who love her unique images.

Born in 1957, Dee Nickerson grew up in rural Norfolk “far away from the madding crowd, I soon learned to use my imagination to entertain myself”. Dee Nickerson studied at Great Yarmouth College of Art and Design. For ten years she worked at the Norwich branch of Liberty’s where she was able to develop her love of design and pattern which is evident in her paintings.  “Making and drawing have always been part of routine, along with wanderings about, and making time to stand and stare.”
